TypeSignature.Value: .class public sequential ansi sealed beforefieldinit EntityLoadInfo extends System.ValueType

summary.para: Information required to create an instance of an entity based on a row of data returned from a query.
This type is typically used by database providers (and other extensions). It is generally not used in application code.
